# **Manage AI Risk.Productionize Use-Cases at Scale.**
**Security, hallucination, and compliance gaps are stifling your AI production goals.** Dynamo delivers auditable AI guardrails, hallucination checks, red-teaming, and observability so you can productionize AI with confidence.
[Book a Demo](https://dynamo.ai/</contact-us>)
![Hero Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/662001471eb8536e059d7371_Frame%201000007586.webp)
f
#### AI Security Guardrails and Red-teaming
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/67b522ed7c27358ae21f0f08_Image%201.png)
Industry leading AI security guardrails and evaluations constantly updated to defend against 20+ jailbreaking and prompt injection vulnerabilities. 
#### Customizable Compliance Guardrails
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/67b52fc4df8b027a79a4a69c_Image%202%20Custom.png)
Enable legal, risk, compliance, and cyber teams to define custom guardrails tailored to your organizations specific compliance requirements.
#### Hallucination Detection & Prevention
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/67b522ed0b86116385982b45_Image%203%20Hal.png)
Real-time hallucinations detection and LLM failure modes, including detailed root cause analysis to remediate problematic LLM responses. 
![Glow Line](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/661f30306e3b4d942f9bb46e_Glow%20Line.webp)
Trusted by top global organizations
![Dynamo AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/660723f9bbf89990ef37c394_Aisin.webp)![Dynamo AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/660723fadacca1ecf89dea91_Lenovo.webp)![Dynamo AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/660723f99b8b7fc64fc7ffc1_Qualcomm.webp)![Yuh](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/661eda243812a4f9d5d2c5bc_Yuh%20\(1\).webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/669564fec64515b33ac09e5f_zinglylogo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/66b68c3da4d605edf08d035e_globalAtlanticLogo.png)
![Dynamo AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/660723f9bbf89990ef37c394_Aisin.webp)![Dynamo AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/660723fadacca1ecf89dea91_Lenovo.webp)![Dynamo AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/660723f99b8b7fc64fc7ffc1_Qualcomm.webp)![Yuh](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/661eda243812a4f9d5d2c5bc_Yuh%20\(1\).webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/669564fec64515b33ac09e5f_zinglylogo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/66b68c3da4d605edf08d035e_globalAtlanticLogo.png)
## Security at the Core
Protect your AI from vulnerabilities and threats. Our system evaluates security risks and ensures your model remains resilient against adversarial attacks, data breaches, and unauthorized access. We provide a comprehensive analysis of potential risks and embed proactive defense mechanisms to fortify your AI model.
[Learn How DynamoEval Evaluates your Model](https://dynamo.ai/<#Products>)[View Our Recent Security Report on DeepSeekR1](https://dynamo.ai/<#Products>)

We provide a comprehensive analysis of potential risks and embed proactive defense mechanisms to fortify your AI model.

## Dynamo covers every layers for privacy and security compliance
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur. Consequat mi felis pellentesque duis. Placerat sit libero cras diam lacus augue volutpat commodo at. Nam tincidunt neque nunc convallis. Netus donec ut facilisi facilisi nisl.
## Dynamo embeds privacy, security, and compliance into your AI stack
Enterprises adopting AI today face a wave of emerging compliance, security, and privacy challenges and sweeping regulatory changes. Productionizing enterprise-grade AI solutions in compliance with emerging regulation requires a comprehensive approach that addresses AI risks at various layers of the AI stack. The Dynamo AI product suite spans the entire AI development lifecycle, including AI system evaluations and red-teaming, model enhancement and risk remediation, and system guardrails with real-time observability.
## Dynamo AI Modules
![Eval](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/661ff0f327620a0ec2010b42_Eval.webp)![Eval Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/661ff14fa1317527b0fc82ce_BW%20Dark%20-%20Eval%20Logo.webp)
DynamoEval provides automated stress testing of AI systems and autogenerates documentation needed for regulatory audits.
[Learn More](https://dynamo.ai/</platform/dynamoeval>)
![Enhance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/661ff0f3af548c793e7ef89b_Enhance.webp)![BW DARK](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/661ff15025e36b73b6536753_BW%20Dark%20-%20Enhance%20Logo.webp)
DynamoEnhance remediates identified risks and enhances models to bolster data privacy, security, and overall robustness of your AI systems.
[Learn More](https://dynamo.ai/</platform/dynamoenhance>)
![Gaurd](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/661ff0f38249c3dbec119ee2_Guard.webp)![Guard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac95638/661ff150f6bad818e5f37fbc_BW%20Dark%20-%20Guard%20Logo.webp)
DynamoGuard enables enterprises to deploy customizable AI guardrails and offers a full observability platform to audit LLM usage.
[Learn More](https://dynamo.ai/</platform/dynamoguard>)
## Dynamo AI prepares your enterprise for emerging AI regulations by automating vulnerability assessments, bolstering your red-teaming process, and offering LLM safety guardrails
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac956b7/661d989c854dcf911901ec3e_Flag_of_Europe%201.png)
#### EU AI ACT
The EU AI act takes a risk-triage approach to AI regulation. Dynamo's core product modules help you ensure a comprehensive risk-based approach.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac956b7/661d95661ee3b5ae5a26221f_CISA%20Logo.png)
#### CISA, UK NCSC
The guidance highlights the need for effective security testing and red-teaming of AI systems. This can be done in an automated fashion with DynamoEval
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66030bc3057ae1e90ac956b7/661d954ec6a89c2cc7a5cbce_White%20House%20Logo.png)
#### White House Executive Order
The executive order will require federal agencies to evaluate the effectiveness of privacy preserving techniques. Dynamo's automated compliance documentation provides the framework to define overall effectiveness.

generated_description:
### Dynamo AI: Making Compliance-Ready AI Accessible for Enterprises

Dynamo AI is a San Francisco-based startup founded in 2021, part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W22. With a team of 40 employees, their mission is crystal clear: to provide enterprise solutions that are compliant-ready for the emerging AI landscape. 

#### The Problem They're Solving

As companies dive deeper into integrating AI, they face a myriad of challenges surrounding privacy, security, and compliance. These challenges are further complicated by a swiftly evolving regulatory environment focused on AI. Dynamo AI addresses this by offering end-to-end solutions that help organizations navigate these complexities, making it easier to adopt AI technologies without running afoul of regulations.

#### What They Offer

Dynamo AI's suite includes several key products designed to ensure that AI implementations are secure, compliant, and robust. Their offerings consist of:

1. **DynamoEval**: An AI evaluation tool that automates stress testing and generates necessary documentation for regulatory audits.
   
2. **DynamoEnhance**: This tool enhances AI models by remediating identified risks and reinforcing data privacy and security.
   
3. **DynamoGuard**: It provides customizable AI guardrails along with a comprehensive observability platform for auditing Large Language Model (LLM) usage.

These products work together to create a framework that safeguards AI models from vulnerabilities, ensuring compliance with regulations like the EU AI Act and various federal guidelines.

#### Why It Matters

In a world where the stakes are high—think data breaches and compliance penalties—Dynamo AI's focus on security, practical usability, and compliance is a game-changer. Their offerings allow enterprises to adopt AI tools confidently, knowing their operations are shielded from potential risks associated with AI deployment.

#### Leadership and Vision

One notable figure in their journey is Tom Blomfield, a seasoned leader who brings valuable insights through his role as Group Partner. Under his guidance, Dynamo AI is carving out a niche that ensures businesses can leverage AI innovation without compromising on compliance or security.

#### Final Thoughts

Dynamo AI represents a timely solution to the modern enterprise's greatest hurdles in leveraging AI effectively. As they continue to evolve their offerings, they're not just providing tools—they're partnering with companies to reimagine what compliant AI can look like in practice. For anyone looking to navigate the complexities of integrating AI sustainably, Dynamo AI is certainly one to watch. If you're interested in learning more or perhaps booking a demo, check out their website at [dynamo.ai](https://dynamo.ai).
